node.html: A low-poly 3D interior design program made with Three.js for my Computer Graphics class.
UI/UX Design for UC Santa Cruz's premier hackathon - CruzHacks.
Batch scripts made during my internship at CyArk. Automate various processes and streamlines workflows in Reality Capture software
3D Website for the art collective Space Cowboy. Developed with React Three Fiber.
A blog post about how I created a range of batch scripts during my internship at CyArk.
C program that builds an HTTP Server. Handles client connections, processes valid HTTP commands, and produces responses according to a defined set of rules.
Server that adds a thread-safe queue and rwlocks to an HTTP server. Ensures that its responses conform to a coherent and atomic linearization of the client requests.
Web developer for the Tech4Good Lab at UC Santa Cruz. Interned under a team of researchers and graduate students to develop responsive sites.
Three.js implementation of the stunning octane render design created at Loudmob.media.

Created the Fig 6. that is published in the Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorders Nature Journal article. Worked with researcher Edward Reilly to develop images to replicate common facial features associated with FASDs.

frontmatter.title: Graphic and Logo Designer for E4E

node.html: Created the logo for the nonprofit organization Encinitas4Equality and designed merchandise, posters, and graphics to be spread all across San Diego.
Utilized PBR workflows for mobile development in Unity (modeling, texturing, and rigging animated characters and assets).
Sharing my original 3D works to Sketchfab - a platform to discover, buy and sell 3D, VR/AR content. 40k+ impressions.

frontmatter.title: Design Instructor for UC San Diego Program

node.html: Instructor for 40 high school students, teaching Photoshop and Wix in an annual summer course.

frontmatter.title: Website Creator for RMTL at UC San Diego

node.html: Website creator for the Research Methodology Training Lab at UC San Diego.
My job at Ponto Cove involved converting a product designer's 2D sketches to 3D models and renders. You can view some of the renders on my gallery.
Applied my 3D modeling, rigging and animating skills to create a VR game with Unity. Used particle systems, program in C#, light baking techniques, and deploy builds to the Oculus Rift/Go.

Developed assets for a VR game that soothes sensory issues in children with autism. Worked alongside a team of psychologists at UCSD to design characters tailored to mitigate potential triggers like harsh lighting and textures.
